Category:Tales from a Galaxy Far, Far Away: Aliens: Volume I

nodes.text: "True Love" is a short story by Landry Q. Walker that was published in the anthology Tales from a Galaxy Far, Far Away: Aliens: Volume I on April 5, 2016. The story focuses on Unkar Plutt, the scrap trader.
The repugnant scrap trader Unkar Plutt may finally have met his match in the twisty tale "True Love."
